# 6.5.1 subset selection

```{r}
library(ISLR2)
#View(Hitters)
names(Hitters)
dim(Hitters)
sum(is.na(Hitters$Salary))
```

disregarding entries with no salary:
```{r}
Hitters2 <- na.omit(Hitters)
dim(Hitters2)
```

subset selection using the `leaps` library:
```{r}
library(leaps)
```
